name: Frame Interpolation (RIFE)
description: Increase video frame rate using RIFE optical flow interpolation. Essential for slow-motion effects and upconverting AI-generated video (16fps) to cinema frame rates (24fps, 48fps). Multiplier 2x doubles framerate, 4x quadruples it.

multiplier.note: 2x = double fps, 4x = quadruple. Higher = slower processing

tips: To convert 16fps Wan video to 24fps cinema: use multiplier 3 then output at 48fps (2x slow-mo) or 24fps (realtime)
RIFE 4.9 handles large motion better than older versions
Process in segments for long videos to avoid VRAM issues
